promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple ibex dark-type pokemon wearing a purple cosmic mask. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Stellebex, a a chibi cute simple ibex dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Corner. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "dark" or "Stellebex". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, ibex-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This petite mountain dweller thrives in caverns, using its Corner ability to expertly navigate rocky terrain while charming anyone who crosses its path.
